string.value:
#cAttribute: Lux (Light)#

string.name: desc
string.value: A mischievous Halloween spirit in the form of a pumpkin. \nEquip this pet Pumpkin O' to use the skill: #cPumpkin Magic#. The skill becomes more powerful when you are equipped with more Pumpkin pets. Pumpkin pets grow when you hunt monsters in your Level range while equipped with them, and they auto-cast an amazing buff when they reach a certain size. When they reach Giant size, they auto-cast a buff every 5 minutes after the last buff in the previous stage. \n#cSkills: Pet Giant skill, Meso Magnet, Item Pouch#
